t: Amazon.com: Dryer Max Dryer Balls : Beauty & Personal Care
s: I got a pair of Dryer Max Dryer Balls from a friend that works at Ross and CVS. The dryer balls from Ross are authentic and are much softer and lighter blue. These knockoffs are darker blue, have pointier nodules, and are much harder. Even the plastic wrapping is thin and tears apart easily.
